AccountManagementLabel_We_couldnt_find_a: We couldn't find an account with that email address.
AccountManagementLabel_Thats_an_incorrec: That's an incorrect password. Try again.
That's an incorrect serial # for that email address.
AccountManagementLabel_Your_renewal_for_: Your renewal for dslrBooth 6 expires on {expirationDate}.
Your renewal for dslrBooth 6 expired on {expirationDate}.
AccountManagementLabel_If_you_wish_to_us: If you wish to use dslrBooth 7, you will need to subscribe to a paid plan.
AccountManagementLabel_You_will_not_be_c: You will not be charged until your renewal date.
AccountManagementLabel_Your_subscription: Your subscription supports up to {numberOfDevices} devices.
AccountManagementLabel_Please_subscribe_: Please subscribe to remove watermark in future sessions.
AccountManagementLabel_Already_subscribe: Already subscribed? Sign in with the correct email address.
AccountManagementLabel_dslrBooth_offers_: dslrBooth offers you free hosting of your photos and videos to enable sharing features and track sharing activity such as e-mail and sms. You can manage your photos and download sharing activity through fotoShare Cloud.
AccountManagementLabel_You_have_reached_: You have reached your device activation limit
AccountManagementLabel_Sign_out_of_one_o: Sign out of one of the devices or update subscription to continue.
AccountManagementLabel_You_are_currently: You are currently signed in with
AccountManagementLabel_Sign_out_and_use_: Sign out and use a different account
AccountManagementLabel_dslrBooth_vVersio: dslrBooth v{versionNumber} is no longer supported. Please update from dslrBooth.com/download to continue using this app.
AccountManagementLabel_Please_subscribe_: Please subscribe to continue using the application.
AccountManagementLabel_dslrBooth_needs_t: dslrBooth needs to restart to complete logging out.
AccountManagementLabel_There_is_an_issue: There is an issue with your subscription. Please download the latest version of dslrBooth from dslrbooth.com/download and try again.
AccountManagementLabel_Please_connect_to: Please connect to the internet to verify your subscription.
LamaBotLabel_Turn_on_Robot_ensure_LED_is: Turn on Robot, ensure LED is blue and not blinking.
LamaBotLabel_Connect_ethernet_cable_from: Connect ethernet cable from robot controller port 1 to the computer's ethernet jack.
LamaBotLabel_Robot_has_detected_a_collis: Robot has detected a collision. Please make sure pathway of robot is safe and clear of any obstructions.
LamaBotLabel_Your_computer_does_not_have: Your computer does not have an Ethernet port which is required.
LamaBotLabel_dslrBooth_will_change_your_: dslrBooth will change your '{networkInterfaceDescription}' wired network adapter's IP address to connect to LamaBot. It will change it back when dslrBooth shuts down.
LamaBotLabel_Add_the_glambot_add_on_to_y: Add the glambot add-on to your subscription.
LamaBotLabel_Disconnect_your_camera_and_: Disconnect your camera and remove it from the robot before running this command
LamaBotLabel_Do_you_wish_to_set_your_eth: Do you wish to set your ethernet adapter back to automatic IP assignment? Choose yes if you use your ethernet adapter to connect to the internet when you're not using LamaBot.
LamaBotLabel_Do_you_want_to_pack_the_Lam: Do you want to pack the LamaBot robot? Make sure you don't damage your camera.
LamaBotLabel_Do_you_want_to_mount_the_La: Do you want to mount the LamaBot robot? Make sure you don't damage your camera.
LamaBotLabel_Robot_is_not_in_the_correct: Robot is not in the correct mode. Please change the robot mode to TCP/IP Secondary development under DoBot Studio > Settings > Nova > Remote Control or contact our support team for assistance.
LamaBotLabel_Your_robot_is_running_an_in: Your robot is running an incompatible version of the controller firmware (v{firmwareVersion}). Please contact support@lumasoft.co to help you update to the compatible version v3.5.5.0.
DeleteEventLabel_Are_you_sure_you_want_t: Are you sure you want to permanently delete these event settings and cancel all event pending shares?
Are you sure you want to permanently delete these {numberOfEvents} event settings and cancel all event pending shares?
DeleteEventLabel_Uploaded_items_will_not: Uploaded items will not be deleted from fotoShare Cloud.
DeleteEventLabel_Also_delete_event_photo: Also delete event photos and videos from this computer.
LinkSharingLabel_Let_anyone_with_the_lin: Let anyone with the link see photos and videos in this album.
GoProLabel_1_Connect_your_GoPro_with_a_U: 1. Connect your GoPro with a USB cable.
GoProLabel_It_is_necessary_to_install_Wi: It is necessary to install Windows Media Player to reproduce videos. Please, follow the steps explained in this support article to install it and restart dslrBooth.
Error_Message_Event_name_can_only_contai: Event name can only contain alphanumeric characters and spaces.
LinkSharingLabel_Are_you_sure_you_want_t: Are you sure you want to deactivate link sharing?
LinkSharingLabel_The_previous_link_to_th: The previous link to this album will no longer work and cannot be recovered in the future.
SyncingEventsLabel_Set_clock_to_the_corr: Set clock to the correct date/time.
Error_Message_You_must_enable_Photo_mode: You must enable Photo mode in Capture Settings to enable Print in payments.
Error_Message_You_must_enable_at_least_o: You must enable at least one product when payments are enabled.
Info_Message_Your_Stripe_account_has_bee: Your Stripe account has been successfully linked to this event.
Error_Message_Failed_to_link_your_Stripe: Failed to link your Stripe account. {errorMessage}
Error_Message_Failed_to_save_payment_set: Failed to save payment settings in your Stripe account. {errorMessage}
Error_Message_Booth_must_be_able_to_conn: Booth must be able to connect to the internet to accept payments. Check the internet connection.
PaymentsLabel_Congrats_You_are_now_ready: Congrats! You are now ready to receive payments.
Error_Message_Please_complete_the_Stripe: Please complete the Stripe onboarding process in order to accept payments.
Info_Message_Your_current_design_is_a_di: Your current design is a different size than your primary screen. Would you like to update your design to match the size of your primary screen?
